I just called to tell you I'm chucking everything you ever gave me into the Norfolk pond. Anyway, as I was saying: I'm never talking to you again. This friendship... is officially over. She hangs up and unzips the bag, ready to dump its conten when we:

Hey, you wanna be best friends?

And that was it.

(startling them) Lesbos!!! They lose their balance and eat it.
We started doing everything alike. Dressed in matching SHREK COSTUMES, they rush up to a doorstep, sticking out their plastic pumpkins for candy.
Aww, you boys make such adorable ogres.

We learned new things together. Now 9-years-old, Nadine and Krista are frozen in front of television, their eyes as big as baseballs. Turn to reveal: They found the CINEMAX channel. Darian suddenly pops up from behind the couch.
You big fat perverted molesters! I'm telling mom!
And kept nothing secret. (CONTINUED )

A lone box of ULTRA ABSORBENT MAXI-PADS goes by on the conveyer belt. Nadine and Krista hide their faces in magazines as the MALE CASHIER rings them up.
As we grew up, theoretically, we should've grown apart.
Now 14, Krista trades in her glasses for CONTACT LENSES. smiles for Nadine, showing off the 'new her.'
(blinking uncontrollably) Whaddaya think?
(sincerely impressed) Wooocooowwwwww.

(to Krista) Do I still look like him, or is it better now? She holds up a PHOTO of PEDRO FROM NAPOLEON DYNAMITE for comparison. Even without the mustache, the resemblance is uncanny.

Nadine and Krista are all dolled up... and sitting alone the bleachers, guy after guy walking right past them with so much as a glance. (CONTINUED )
But as it turned out, growing up just made us closer.
Fuck these people. Krista nods in agreement. They head for the door.
That is, until it didn't... RECORD SCREECHES TO A HALT and we END MONTAGE.

Everyone is sectioned off into cliques: Mean Girls eyeing their manicures and complaining about the heat. Jocks wit their pecks flexed. The Dorks. The Drama Kids. The one pregnant chick and her boyfriend who knows his life is ov aaaaaaaaaand-— Nadine and Krista, now 16, still just the two of them. He's walking out of the cafeteria -- handsome, tan, and wearing a bright red and green RONALDO JERSEY. Time stops the music swells as he runs his fingers through his hair. Nadine gazes at him longingly, mesmerized. All of the sud her burrito SMASHES INTO HER FACE, beans and rice everywh

You should try smiling more, it's good for you.
You should try.... not sucking more! And not being so dumb and retarded...more. Darian frowns at her pitiful comeback. Feels bad for her.

I love you, Nadine. Nadine rolls her eyes, watches as Darian walks over to th FLAGPOLE where the popular people hang out. Nadine spins around to find ERWIN KIM (16), Korean, stoop shouldered, velcro sandals with socks.

Oh nothin', you know, just hanging with my bros... (butchers it) Chillizzillin'...like a bowwss. Just then, ERWIN'S PARENTS bark at him in Korean, gesturi for him to rejoin their game. He pretends that didn't jus happen.

(inching away from it) Whoa whoa whoa! He forces her right out the door, SLAMS it shut, locks it
A bristle hit my thumb, you idiot! I hope I die of e-coli just so you feel guilty the rest of your life! The DOORBELL RINGS.
Nadine opens it to find Krista at the threshold.
Hey, what are you doing here?

It's good, I need your help with my hair. I know it looks like a rat's nest, but is it in a cool, hip, Amy Winehouse kind of way? Or more just like "hi, the mental hospital confiscated my hairbrush"? Be honest.
I think maybe more the second one.
Crap, I kinda thought so. Krista steps inside. Nadine heads up the stairs.
Hey, so any word if your mom's friend can sew the hotdog suits for us?
Yeah, she's gonna make ‘em out of polyfiber foam, that way they'll bend and breathe but still maintain their hotdoggy shape. Cool, right? (CONTINUED )
Love it. Genius. (realizes) Why are you still standing there? Come upstairs.
Uh... well, actually, I need to tell you something, and I don't know how you're going to take it. Nadine freezes.
Oh no, is Hot Soccer Dan in a coma? Oh god.
No, no, he's fine. It's just that... I didn't really come here to hang out.
Okay...
I came here to grab a burger. (beat) With your brother. Nadine says nothing. Absolutely nothing.
I know. I know. This is very weird. And I know I said I didn't like him. But then he asked me to get a burger. And then I said yes. And then... Well that's pretty much the whole story actually.
Like...like a date?

That sounds like every date I've ever imagined being on. (CONTINUED )
Darian comes down the stairs, all spruced up for the date
Oh my god he has his good jeans on!
See you later, Nader. As they head out the door, Krista turns back to Nadine.
Are you okay? Tell me you're okay and you're not pissed. Nadine just stands there. Wordless, awestruck.
Eh, she's fine. He shuts the door.
Nadine eats breakfast as Krista tentatively approaches.
Hey. How are you?
Fine. You?

This isn't you. It's like a Terminator-version of you and I'm supposed to think it's you, but I can tell it's really a computerized look-a-like sent from the future to offer me hashbrowns and eat my brains. (CONTINUED )
Eat your brains? When does the Terminator eat anyone's brains?
Stop bullshitting me, Nadine.
What do you want me to say? You get drunk, you hook up with my brother, then you go on a date and don't even have the decency to call me from the bathroom!
You wanted me to call you from the bathroom, that's what you're mad about?
You always call me from the bathroom on dates. Don't act like this is new!
The circumstances were a little different this time!
So is he your boyfriend now? You guys are like an item all the sudden?
It was one date.
So it was a date!
Oh my god, Nadine.
I'm not comfortable with this. I'm not comfortable with it at all.
So what do you want me to do then?
I want you to never go out with him again. He's my brother. (MORE ) (CONTINUED )
He's off limits. I don't like it and that's it! Krista stands there a second, thinking this over. Finally
Fine.
(beat) Seriously?
Yes. Seriously.
Sweet. (beat) ‘nother hashbrown square?
Nadine stands under the penis tree spraying a CAN OF DISINFECTANT. Krista walks up.
I think I've almost stamped out the Erwin barf smell for good. This stuff is industrial grade, they use it on bum piss at the Third Street Promenade.
I take it back.
You take what back.
I'm not not-seeing your brother. I've been thinking about this and you really like peanut butter cups, right? Well, I would never ask you to stop eating them just because they make me uncomfortable.
What? That's the worst analogy I've ever heard. First of all, my brother isn't a scrumptious chocolate snack, and second, how can peanut butter cups make you uncomfortable? (CONTINUED )
Lots of ways. Maybe I have a peanut allergy. Maybe I just have nightmares about them jumping down my throat and clogging up my arteries.

That's crazy! They're not even that fatty! Whatever, you know what, fine. I would, I would never touch another goddamn peanut butter cup as long as I live just for you. In fact, I'd have them all put ona big boat and dumped in the middle of the ocean because that's just how much of a good freaking friend I am!
That would do nothing! That would just kill a whole bunch of sea life!
I'd kill that sea life in the name of our friendship! I'd murder fish to make you happy! Krista rubs her temples, sighs.
He asked me to go lunch at Jack In The Box and I want to go, and I want you to come with us.
Are you fucking kidding me?
No. I'm not.
No way in hell, Krista! I'd rather eat alone! I'd rather sit here all alone under this tree, just me and the penis and this can of disinfectant!
Nadine-- (CONTINUED )
No, you know what? Go ahead! Have a blast with Darian at Jack In The Box because apparently that's what you want to do sooooo bad!
Are you seriously being this dramatic?
Go! See ya later! G'bye, Krista! Krista hangs there a moment. Then:

Fine. I will. She turns and leaves. Nadine watches her go, then sits a under the tree. She looks up at the penis carving, then o at the disinfectant. A group of SENIORS walk by, eyeing h sitting there all alone.

(blurts self-consciously) I'm waiting for someone! Another moment passes. We go to an ultra-wide shot of Nad as a tiny little dot, the only person eating by herself i the whole entire school. She can't handle it.
Dahhh!!! She immediately grabs her stuff, runs after Krista.
Krista and Darian are up front. Nadine is scrunched in th cab, straddling his STINKY PILE OF FOOTBALL PADS.
You okay back there? The wind is tearing through the windows, whipping Nadine' hair all over the place and stirring up the B.0. stink.
I'm wonderful.
How do those football pads smell? Glad you tagged along, sis? (CONTINUED )

Carly Corvetti gets up from a table of her TWO ALMOST-AS- FRIENDS, saunters over.

Curly fries are my favorite. They remind me of something I just had completely waxed off. Darian raises his eyebrows. Carly smiles at him.
We're just leaving, but you're coming to my party next week, right? And I don't think I've met your new little friends... Darian puts his arm around Krista, pulls her towards him.
This... would be Krista. Carly grins at Krista, but her face says, "You're having lunch with this chick?"
And that would be her friend, Nadine. Who also happens to be my sister.
(pops out from behind him) Helloooooo Miss Lady. (no response) From Step Brothers? No? (beat) Congratulations on your pubes.  41.

So this is what you guys did last night? Silently chewed your food and stared at each other? It's a real blast, lemme tell ya.
Did you ever think that maybe it's awkward because you're sitting here?
I'm impeding your conversation then?

And what would you be talking about that you couldn't say in front of me? Darian lifts his eyebrows, looks at Krista conspiratorial
Ew. You talk about your balls or something? Is that what you guys do? "Blah blah blah, Darian's balls, Darian's penis, half an hour of Darian's balls and penis" and then you call it an evening?
Pretty much word for word.
Don't be sarcastic right now.
She's right. There's no reason we shouldn't act exactly the same as we did last night. (acting the same) Hey, Krista?
Yeah? (CONTINUED )

You've got some sauce on your chin. He leans over and runs his tongue all the way up her face slowly licking it off. Krista lets out a loud laugh, punc him in the arm. Nadine throws her chicken sandwich down, disgusted.
You. Sick. Motherfuckers.

Nadine is slumped on the couch, watching her mom do Wii Aerobics.
I think it's great. Maybe they'll fall in love and get married and Krista will be your sister like you've always wanted.
Mom. Do not even say that. (looks heavenward) You didn't hear that, Universe!

I'm not going out with Futch. He's fat and he barely talks and no.
Don't be mean to fat people. Your mother's fat. (CONTINUED )
You're not fat. Does Jerry tell you that? Is that why you're doing aerobics? I'll kill him.
No, no, Jerry thinks I'm beautiful. He tells me all the time. Nadine pauses, thinking about that.
See, that's the thing, isn't it.
What?

I think you're beautiful, Nadine. Nadine just looks at her.
That's the most terrible thing you've ever said to me, mom.
Why?
Because I -- nevermind. Nadine gets up, leaves the room. Mona frowns.
Nadine steps into the bathroom, closes the door behind he takes a deep breath, then addresses herself.
Nadine, just relax, okay? You're getting all worked up and crazy. This whole thing is going to pass. (MORE) (CONTINUED )

In fact, I'll bet you a million bucks it already fizzled out after that bizarro lunch today, I mean you saw them, they have nothing in common. You're gonna be okay. On her way out, something on the bathroom counter catches eye: A BAG FROM RITE AID. She looks inside, curious. MOUTHWASH, OLD SPICE DEODORANT, and AXE BODY SPRAY. Move, you're in the way.

Move or I'll do it for you. His CELL PHONE RINGS. He picks it up.
Oh hey, Krista, what's up. Nadine's eyes pop open. He slides right past her into his room.
What?! That's her? She's calling you? (CONTINUED )

No. Uh-uh. No way. She pulls out her own PHONE and dials Krista.
Oh how funny, I just called your bro, can I call you right back?
No you can't, Krista. I really don't know how to feel about this whole you suddenly phoning Darian thing.
Okay, I don't really see what the big--

The big deal is you can just call me, and after we talk, if there's time, and he's around, and I have any minutes left, I'll maybe consider handing it to him. Hey watch it, that's nice wood.

If he thinks I'm just gonna sit back as he steals my best friend and tries to edge me out, he has no idea how wrong he is! No idea! She stomps to her room, SLAMS the door. Mona looks concer She walks over to the door, knocks.
Honey, can I tell you something? It worries me when you're nostril does that thing. There's no answer.  46.

Wow, that's so cool you're not even embarrassed to admit that. We should totally all hang out sometime. Just then, Nadine comes up, squeezes herself between Kris and Darian, puts an arm around each, big smile.
So where are we going to lunch today, kiddos?
You're in a good mood.
You know, I thought about it more, and I'm actually kind of looking forward to all the time the three of us will be spending together...
(Dream on) All the time?

Speaking of which, I know how busy you are Darian, so I went ahead and picked this up for you. She pulls out his NEW MONTH'S PRESCRIPTION OF IBS PILLS, makes a big spectacle of it. He reddens, grabs it away, stuffs it in his backpack.
Don't be embarrassed. A lot of people have IBS. I bet a ton of your friends do, too. (CONTINUED )
You better shut your mouth right now, Nad--

As in... you play the flute?

Hey, has anyone told you guys you kinda look alike? They just stare blankly at her.
Interesting how much better that joke was in my head.
We can go somewhere else if you want. (CONTINUED )
No, no, practice. I brought my burrito.
Oh... well, I don't know...
Don't be nervous, I won't look at you, I'll just stare at my feet if that helps.

Uh... alright. As Erwin gets up his nerve, Nadine finds a seat in the theatre, pulls out her burrito. Erwin starts out slow, th gathers confidence, until finally breaking into an awesom rendition of Come on Eileen by Dexy's Midnight Runners. H jams on it, adding a badass beat-boxing element. Nadine drops her burrito, watching him in awe. It's absolutely fucking incredible. When he finishes, she give him a standing ovation.
Holy shit, are you kidding me, Erwin?! He kicks the ground, bashful.
Oh, be quiet... (then) Wait, you mean that in, like, a good way, right?
I can't believe you just beat-boxed on that thing. Who are you?!
That's a new technique I'm trying out.
I don't know how else to say this, but you have single-handedly made being a flautist insanely cool. Erwin smiles ear to ear, he could receive no bigger compliment.  65.
Nadine's still singing and snapping as she walks toward t SCHOOL BUS pick-up.

Come on Eileen, oh I swear what he means, at this moment you mean eeeeevverythinnnnng... Just then, she spots Krista across the parking lot, kissi Darian goodbye. He heads off to football practice, and ju into Heather's waiting CONVERTIBLE with FOUR OTHER POPULA GIRLS. Heather turns up her music and the girls hoot and cheer as they screech off. Nadine suddenly feels like absolute crap, a lump gatherin her throat. Not only is her plan not working -- it's completely backfiring.
Darian is lifting weights in the garage when Nadine burst through the door, announces:
Krista has dandruff!
What?

There's a Costco-size bottle of Head and Shoulders in her shower, if you don't believe me. If she doesn't use it? Flakes the size of shaved coconut. Not exaggerating. Darian sets down the weights, sensing what this is.
Nadine, I know exactly what you're doing and it's not--
In the 7th grade, she had chronic bacne. He starts pushing her out of the garage.
Get out. (CONTINUED )
People used to call her Unusually Lot Of Bacne Person. Nobody even took the time to give her a clever name!
Nadine-- He's forcing her out the door.
One time, she ran out of pads and used her dad's tube sock! He's got her out of the garage.
G'bye!

head_text.subj: FRESHMAN YEAR SHE POOPED IN A

text: This tidbit makes Darian pause a beat. Then he slams the on her.
Nadine tosses and turns in bed, unable to sleep because s can hear Darian on the phone with Krista. He's giggling a doing a little cutesy-wootsey voice. She finally throws a BOOK at the wall.

You've been on the phone for 2 hours. And stop doing that baby voice, you're a grown freaking man! He just giggles louder. She gives up, switches on her TV, turns the volume up to drown him out. Flipping through channels, she lands on the 1970's film, Carrie. She's about to change it, but then something about it intrigues her...
Nadine finds Krista at her locker. (CONTINUED )
I need to talk to you about something.
Oh you mean like an actual conversation? Not just rushing me off the phone or disappearing on me?
I know, I'm sorry. But I figured something out last night. Something big.
Okay.
I'm worried you'll freak out when I tell you, though, because it's really unfair to you and it might involve pig's blood.
It might involve pig's blood?
And worse possibly. Fires. John Travolta's car exploding.
What the hell are you talking about, Nadine.
Have you ever seen the movie, Carrie?
I've never even heard of that movie.

So there's this girl, Carrie, and she's all dicked up 'cause her mom's a psycho and makes her read the bible 20 hours a day or some shit, I missed the beginning. But the point is, there are these prick popular kids who think it's funny to befriend her and act like she's one of them. (MORE ) (CONTINUED )

The hottest guy in school starts dating her and everything. But it's all one big set up. And the next thing Carrie knows, she's at the prom drenched in blood and her eyeballs go all freaky and she murders like a bajillion people.
And so you're saying?
That -- and I'm sorry because I know this sucks to hear -- Darian's been screwing with you, Krista. Krista just looks at her.
You think he asked me to be his girlfriend as a dare, basically.
Or probably to get back at someone. Or to make someone jealous. And probably that girl with the curly fry pubes is my best guess. Krista's conflicted.
I'm sorry. Seriously. You don't deserve this and I'm so sorry. Krista swallows, suddenly feeling sick.
Krista is

Why would you ever believe that? My sister's an imbecile, you know her well enough to know that. upset, holding back tears. They creep behind a bush for privacy, but kids still eye them on their way to clas
Well, it sorta makes sense though, especially considering...
Considering what? (CONTINUED )
The way Carly acts all in love with you and is always such a huge bitch to me!
And you think that means I like her?
I don't understand why you don't like her! She models, she's in every single yearbook photo, she's got those big perfect boobs that every guy dreams of!
And she's psychotic! And she's on 50 anti-depressants! And those big perfect boobs aren't even real!
They aren't?
No, they are, I just thought that would help my argument. Krista's not in the mood.
No, you know what? I'm taking care of this right now. He shuts his locker, angry.
But the bell already rang.
Just follow me. Darian stomps off, Krista hesitates a moment, then follow after him. He heads into --
Darian marches right past MR. PERRY (40's) who's writing something on the chalkboard. Nadine studies a PLASTIC UTE (CONTINUED )
What are you doing? You can't just walk in here and interrupt our learning!
(to the teacher) I'm borrowing her for a second.
He doesn't have a hall pass, Mr. Perry! He's hurting my finger! Oh god, he has me in a choke hold! Mr. Perry just shrugs and turns back to his blackboard.
The two of them burst out the doors, Darian still has her head lodged under his armpit.
(noticing Krista) What the hell is this?
Apologize and tell her you're a dumbshit for what you said.
I'm not telling her crap!
Tell her mom ate too much soft cheese when she had you, and that's why you're a retard and a dumbshit.
Fuck you, she never cared for soft cheese and you know it! Nadine tries to kick his shins. Darian squeezes tighter. Krista looks on, alarmed.
Darian, let go of her, don't do this.
Tell her you're sorry for making up stories about crapping in Tupperware! (CONTINUED )
Krista's eyes bulge. What did he just say?
Stop it, let go of me! He finally lets go.
I'm going to class. He walks off, leaving Krista and Nadine standing there. Nadine straightens her clothes.
Thanks a lot for the help there, my neck's about to be snapped and you're like-- (imitates, eyes her nails) Wow, I should really get my cuticles cut...
You told him about the tupperware?!
What? I'm sorry...
Why would you tell him that?!
I don't know, it just...slipped out in conversation.
Did you at least say it was your fault, because you refused to pull over?!
Because I was trying to get to Harry Potter on time because they're your favorite movies!
God, you are unbelievable. I'm so sick of this bullshit!
Oh whatever, you love every minute! Oooh, I have five million new Facebook friends, look at me, I'm hot shit all the sudden! (CONTINUED )
You just can't deal with the fact that I'm actually happy and have a boyfriend and a couple friends other than you!
Oh right, get over yourself!
You get over yourself! I'm so tried of kissing your ass and begging you to be okay with me and Darian, I don't give a shit anymore! I'm done!
Good, you think I give a crap?! I'm done, too! D-O-WN! (realizes)
Krista stalks off. Nadine watches her go, a lump gatherin her throat.
Erwin nervously fusses with the radio, adjusting the volu
Is my talk radio too loud for you? Nadine has the passenger seat reclined to the horizontal position, her jacket over her face.
It's fine. Erwin eyes her anxiously, not sure what to do.
Do you want some food? I have a Rice Krispie Treat in my glovebox, I can check if it's expired?
No. Nadine pulls the jacket off her face, looks over at him.
I'm sorry you have to deal with me, Erwin. You're always so nice. (MORE ) (CONTINUED )
It makes me feel like a horrible person.
You're not horrible.
I'm not good like you. I steal from the nut bins at Vons... I don't really like old people...
I'd steal nuts. I'd totally steal a nut. Nadine looks off, heaves a sigh.
I want to just leave and run away and move to Alaska... Erwin looks concerned.
Krista sits with Heather and the other popular girls, sip Frappuccinos and studying. She can't concentrate, the fig with Nadine replaying in her head. Heather notices.
You okay? Did you have too much caffeine and now you can't concentrate and it's making you fidgety and frustrated and also a little horny in a weird way?
Um. I think I just have a lot on my mind.
Hmmm. Krista shakes it off, tries to focus.
While Mona and Jerry make dinner, Nadine is splayed out o the living room floor, hollow eyes gazing hopelessly at t popcorn ceiling. (CONTINUED )
I'm not sure you want to lay on the carpet, I haven't vacuumed up the cat hair in a while.
Uh huh.
Come on, Nader, why don't you make the hummus for me? We could use some help.
Please don't call me Nader, it's too close to neuter, I don't like it. Mona shakes her head.
You're so sensitive lately. Nadine's phone rings: KRISTA. She immediately snaps out o her coma, takes the phone and runs out to--
Nadine tries to figure out how she's going to play this. Finally:
(Mad Men voice) Good afternoon, Draper residence. Krista rolls her eyes, plays along. INTERCUT with her out Starbucks.
Hi Betty, it's Joan. Just called to say I boned your husband because my boobies are massive and it's what we've all been waiting for.
I'm sorry, I believe you have the wrong number. Goodbye.
Nadine, wait. I'm sorry for what I said, I feel really bad about it, I can't think about anything else. (CONTINUED )
Nadine softens, drops the act.
I know, me too... I'm really sorry I told him about... the incident. I kinda spilled the beans on some other stuff, too, I feel really guilty...
I don't know if I want to know.
Probably not.
I think maybe it would help if we spent some time together, you know? Quality time, just you and me, like the olden days.
I'd really like that.
How about this weekend?
Great. Sounds like a dealio. (beat) Punch me if I ever say "sounds like a dealio" again, ‘kay? Krista laughs.
‘kay.
Nadine and Erwin walk and talk.
Well, that's really positive.
Yeah, I think so.
It's like the saying, "Sometimes it takes a big fight to move along and repair things and get all better and stuff..." 75. (CONTINUED )
That doesn't sound like a saying.
It's...a Korean proverb. He's the worst liar ever. Absolutely terrible.
(rolls her eyes, laughs) I love you, Erwin. Erwin grins.
A campy throw-back restaurant with WAITRESSES IN POODLE SKIRTS, ON ROLLERSKATES.
Nadine and Krista follow the HOSTESS, slide into the boot sit, just look at each other. It's almost like a first da
Well, here we are.
Here we are...
Just you and me.
You and me.
So... what's new with you?
Not much. What's new with you as long as it doesn't have to do with Darian, fun things you've done together, the flagpole, or Darian?
I guess not much either then. They just stare at each other for a few more beats, not m more to say. Krista clears her throat, picks up the menu.
Tuna melt sounds good... (CONTINUED )
Oh god, you're reading off the menu because we have nothing to talk about.
No I'm not, I just like tuna melts.
Since when?
Since... I don't know. Recently?
(Dramatic soap opera voice) It's like we don't even know each other anymore... Krista laughs.
Your hair looks good by the way.
Really? I'm wearing a Bump-it.
Your head looks amazing. Huge and amazing.
You always know the exact right thing to say to me. Krista laughs.
Hey, I gotta see how our hotdog suits turned out. She's done with them, right?
Um, yeah.
I just hope they don't chafe or get a billion degrees, you know what I mean?
(hesitates a sec) Yeah, well, uh -- (CONTINUED )
Before she can finish, the WAITRESS roll over.
So what are we having, ladies?
Dos tuna melts and Dr. Peppers please. (clarifies) Dos is Espanol for two. The waitress gives her a look. You think I don't know tha
Oh. And Espanol is Spanish for Spanish.
(beat) Thank you. She rolls away. Nadine leans across table, lowers her voi
That's my new thing I do, I tell people really obvious shit like they don't know it. That nice green stuff outside is called 'grass.' It keeps me entertained. Krista laughs at how weird this is.
I've missed you, dude.
Krista keys their bowling names into the score board. Nad walks up with a couple of DRINKS.
Awww yeah, take a sip of this.
(takes a sip) Woah, how'd you...?
(smiles big) I made friends with the bartender.
That guy? (CONTINUED )
Krista eyes the CREEPY-LOOKING BARTENDER. He waves.
All we have to do is take some pics in his van later.
Sounds perfectly safe to me. They clink glasses, having fun. Nadine picks up her ball.

Alright God, if I get a strike right now, it means Hot Soccer Dan will be my future husband and Krista will one day pee-pee and wipe her you-know with hundred dolla billz. Nadine goes for it. It veers to the left, then back to th right, aaaaaand.... STRIKE!
Hhhhhoooooca000! !!!
(victory arms) Double rainbow across the sky! They high-five each other, dance around.

--Krista does a few twirls and throws the ball with much pizazz. It goes right into the gutter. --Nadine tosses the ball backwards through her legs, it bounces into another lane, knocking somebody else's ball course. --The BARTENDER slides two White Russians in front of the girls, winks. --Krista gutterballs it again. This time, she runs after pulls it out, and bowls it again from the middle of the l --Krista throws a spare. She and Nadine lock arms, doing square-dance jig. (CONTINUED )

--Krista and Nadine pretend to ice skate in their slipper bowling shoes. --Krista and Nadine are now bowling with the ROUGH-LOOKIN OLD COUPLE next to them who wear matching bowling shirts FLAMING BALLS AND PINS. Another round of DRINKS. --The old man shows Krista proper bowling form, while the woman takes Nadine on a tour of her numerous tatoos. --Nadine and Krista are wearing the old couple's BOWLING SHIRTS now, all four of them with their arms around each other, swaying and singing Creedence Clearwater's Have Yo Ever Seen The Rain at the top of their lungs.
The girls help the couple into their 1980's MOTORHOME.
You guys are invited to the holidays, I just want you to know.
And next time we're all getting matching tattoos.
Yes! Badass ones. A dragon giving it to a beaver or something. (beat) I'm just gonna leave it to the tattoo artist. Nadine closes the door, they wave and drive off. Krista shakes her head.
Oh, what a night.
(sings) Oh what a night! Da da da da back in '63!
(sings along) What a very special time for me!

head_text.subj: AS I REMEMBER, WHAT A NIGHT

text: (CONTINUED )
Gayest song ever.
How do we even know that song?
Because we're humongous gaylords. It's official, they're back in their old BFF swing.
Krista, no way, what are you doing here? They turn around to see Heather and her 4 popular friends approaching. Nadine's demeanor immediately shifts.
Oh, hi. We're just leaving. This is my best friend, Nadine. Nadine, this is Heather, Jen, Emily, and Sienna. Nadine smiles awkwardly, suddenly feeling very uncool.
Hola... They all wave and say hi.
Hey, so did you end up getting that dress you tried on or what?
Um... (glances at Nadine) Yeah. Yeah I did.
Cool, and Futch's Uncle's gonna pay for our limo 'cause he's super- loaded and wants to fuck Jen. Jen nods. That's right.
Oh good. Great.
Anyway, we're meeting up with the guys, but we'll see you later? (CONTINUED )
Yeah, have fun. As they walk off, Krista turns to Nadine, not sure what t say.
Dress...? Limo?
Well, uh --
You're going to prom with them instead then.
Nadine, I--
Screw you, I don't want to go with you anyway! Nadine starts speed-walking away, pissed.
Nadine. Wait! NADINE! Nadine walks faster, then turns around, adds--
You know what? I hope your new friends still think you're cool after they get a load of the way you dance! Nadine imitates, doing robot-hands and humping the air wi goofy facial expression.
Yeah. That's how it looks. I never wanted to tell you. Krista doesn't know what to say, kind of stung. Nadine tu around, keeps walking.
Nadine wanders up to her house. He feet are completely blistered from the long walk. Ouch, ouch, ouch, ouch.
She drags herself down the hallway, into --
Her room is dark. She flips on her lights and sees Krista sitting on her bed, waiting for her.
Ew. That was creepy!
Give me a chance to explain.
I don't want hear it.
I was gonna tell you, I was gonna ask you to go with us.
Oh kiss my ass! We had plans and you just flushed them down the toilet without a second thought!
That's not true, I had the suits made and everything, I was planning on it and then--
What?
And then--
And then what, Krista?

And then I realized I don't want be a freaking hotdog for prom! I don't want to act like it's just some big joke to me! I want to wear a dress and do my hair and I want to go with an actual date, not you! This hits Nadine where it hurts.
Get out. (CONTINUED )
I didn't mean it like--
Nadine grabs her by the shirt and pushes her towards the door. Krista screams. Darian opens his bedroom door.
What the hell's going on?! Nadine keeps pushing her down the hallway. Krista starts cry, runs off down the stairs. The front door SLAMS.
Jesus! What is your problem? Nadine fights back tears.
Why'd you have to do it, Darian? You have everything in the world, why'd you have to take my one friend, too? Darian pauses. He never thought of it like this.
Nadine... She runs back to her room, shuts the door.

Where we left off from the opening scene. Nadine unzips h large DUFFLE BAG and begins to unload the contents, inclu TWO MASSIVE FOAM HOTDOG SUITS. She gathers it all up in h arms, ready to toss it in. A passing JOGGER sees her.
Excuse me, that's polluting. You can't do that.
What, you're gonna call the cops on me? Go ‘head. He takes his CELL PHONE out, starts dialing. (CONTINUED )
Ah, crap. She quickly shoves it all back in the bag.
Krista keeps calling Nadine, but Nadine keeps pressing IGNORE. Ring, ignore. Ring, ignore. Ring, ignore. It's li little dance.
Krista passes Nadine in the hallway. She tries to talk to her, but Nadine walks right on by.
Nadine de-friends Krista on Facebook. Then un-follows her Twitter. Then logs onto MYSPACE -- a billion blinking POP ADS clog the screen, it's a total assault on the eyes.
Ahhhhhhh! Make it stop! She can't handle it, immediately closes out of it.
While Erwin practices the flute, Nadine plays Sudoku with twins.
Krista knocks on Nadine's door again and again. Nadine wo open it, turns ANIMAL PLANET up to an obnoxious volume to drown her out.
The popular group is laughing and having a good time, but Krista's mind is somewhere else. Darian squeezes her hand checking if she's alright. She nods, but this is taking a toll on her.
The penis tree has been all alone for weeks now. Two NERD FRESHMAN BOYS walk by. They point and laugh at the carvin then noticing the spot is now vacant, claim it as their o (CONTINUED )
That's it -- there's no going back now.
The whole class has their MICROSCOPES out for an experime where they put a piece of hair on a slide and alter it wi chemicals.
Hey, um, come check out this crazy thing I found in my microscope.
What do enzymes do to the hair again? Turn it to goo or something?
Sorta, but just come look real quick. You have to see this. Nadine goes over and looks into his microscope. Spelled o in pieces of ERWIN'S HAIR are the words WILL YOU PLEASE G
Oh my god. How'd you do that?! Erwin smiles, super proud of himself.
It was extremely hard, I worked on it for three weeks.
Wow, that's amazing!
I know it's last minute, but... will you? Erwin's smile is massive and sincere. Nadine suddenly fee uncomfortable.
Oh. Um... Erwin, that's so nice of you... His smile starts to fall, sensing where this is going. (CONTINUED )

The thing is, I just... I don't think prom's really my thing, I wasn't planning to go. Erwin swallows, his heart suddenly in his throat. Just th Nadine overhears the GOSSIPY GIRL talking on her cell pho
Wait, did she dump Darian or did Darian dump her?
(trying to hear) What? What'd she say?
(covers phone, tells lab partner) Krista dumped Darian! They're not going to Prom tomorrow, she returned her dress and everything!
What?! She did?!
Why?!
I don't know, something about a girl! (into phone) What girl? Who's this girl? (beat, announces) She forgets her name but she's hairy and kinda looks like a human- version of Alf?
Oh my god! I'm hairy and look like Alf! It's totally me!
Whatever.
No, it really is! Oh my god, Erwin, can you believe this? Erwin can't say a word, still flattened from her rejectio  88.
Nadine runs to find Krista. She's by her locker, Heather the girls gathered around consoling her. They see Nadine back off, giving them privacy. Krista's eyes are swollen.
Hey... I heard what happened. Krista wipes her nose, trying to hold it together.
I - I'm sorry.
Are we friends again then?
Krista, of course, I...
(bursts into tears) Good. She covers her face, runs off. Nadine is stunned. A littl ways down, Erwin is getting books from his locker.
God, I think she's really upset. He doesn't respond, chucks his CHEM BOOK into his locker.
What's wrong with you?
Do you know how long it took me to snip all those hairs and make them into little letters, especially the 'S' on 'please'?
Erwin--
Sometimes you're so busy thinking about yourself, you-- you forget about everybody else. He shuts his locker, walks off. Nadine swallows.
Nadine sits, fully clothed, in her mom's empty whirlpool She picks through a BOWL OF POTPOURRI, staring in a deep void. Mona pokes her head in.
What are you doing in here. Mona notices the tears in her eyes, comes in.
Well, based on the music Darian's playing, I can take a wild guess what this is about. Nadine looks off, heaves a sigh.
I feel awful... Mona walks over to the tub.
Mind if I join? Mona climbs into the empty tub next to Nadine. They just there silently a moment.
Isn't this what you were after the whole time.
Not like this... Beat.

I've never seen Krista cry like that before... it was so sad. And then Erwin, I even hurt Erwin, and he's the nicest person ever. Last week he had a spider in his car and felt too bad killing it so he just kept trying to shoo it out the window. It bit him like four times in the process... She shakes her head, thinking. (CONTINUED )
I don't know, mom... I just wanted things to be like they were, you know? When Darian came along it just changed everything. Mona puts an arm around Nadine, pulls her close.

Honey, being friends would be easy if everything always stayed the same... you always lived right down the street from each other, had the same hobbies, were single and not-— single at the same time. But you grow up and realize your lives aren't always going to intersect so neatly. Hell, next year you two may go off to different colleges... Couple years after that, maybe she's married with a baby while you're out freaking some Italian guy you just met at the club. Do they still call it "freaking" or is that over now?
Pretty sure that one's done.

You get my point though. A lot of friendships can't handle change. But the good ones... they adjust. If you really care about each other, you find a way to make it work. Nadine lets this sink in. After a moment, she puts her ar around Mona, hugs her tight.
I love you, mom.
I love you too, hon. (beat, looks around) I'm gonna take more baths.
REM's "Everybody Hurts" wails from Darian's room. Nadine knocks. (CONTINUED )
gl.
After a moment, he opens the door, turns down the music. eating a BEEF STICK (he's already eaten like 12) and look like a wreck.
I'm sorry I was an asshole. Darian sits down on the edge of his bed.
I swear I never meant to mess up your life, Nadine.
Darian --
No, I'm serious. I really wish I would've fallen for somebody else, but I.... I can see why she's your best friend. She's amazing. Nadine can tell how sincere he is.
You've gotta take her to prom tomorrow.
She doesn't want to go.
I have a plan to fix that. I kinda need your assistance, though.
What do you need?
A ride some places, help with a few errands, and if you happen to know the lead singer of Radiohead and/or someone who does sky-writing?
(are you kidding me?) No.
Might have to switch some things around then. No biggie. Darian laughs, throws her a beef stick. (CONTINUED )
Let's do it.
Darian and Nadine burst through the mall doors, where the meet Heather, quickly follow her up the ESCALATOR.
Nadine follows Darian into the empty men's locker room.
You can't tell anyone about this. Nadine locks her lips, throws away the key.
So this is the guy's locker room..
Exciting, huh.
Smells like taco seasoning. Darian approaches a STORAGE CLOSET labeled "FIELD
Pretty sure it's in here.
Darian idles outside PARTY CITY. Nadine runs towards him, arms loaded with SHOPPING BAGS. She jumps in, he zooms of
Darian cuts the engine, quietly rolls up along Erwin's cu They quietly slide out of the car, creeping through the d Nadine dives onto the grass, crawling on her belly milita style.
(whispers ) You think that's necessary? He's just walking normally.
I did at first, but this grass is really wet. (MORE ) (CONTINUED )
(beat) ‘kay, that's poop, I'm getting up. She pops up. They tip-toe up the driveway.
Darian and Nadine approach a crowded Persian Dance Club, line of CLUB-GOERS down the block. Even from the street, can hear the Persian singer WAILING AWAY.
This is it?
That's what mom told me... They get in line, both looking very nervous about this.
It's 2am. Nadine and Darian are exhausted. They give each other a tired high-five, Nadine collapses into bed.
ERWIN'S DAD opens the front door, bends down to pick up t NEWSPAPER when something across the front yard catches hi eye. He stands bolt upright.

(in Korean) Erwin! Get out here right now! Erwin comes to the door in his pajamas to behold: His MINI-VAN has been decorated with a million colorful streamers, balloons, confetti, the windows shoe-polished little stars and happy faces and messages like "Erwin freaking rocks!" A huge smile spreads across his face.
Nadine driving Darian's pick-up when her phone rings. Intercut between her and Erwin. (CONTINUED )
Did you happen to decorate my mom's van with a bunch of streamers and stuff?
Maybe. Do you like it?
It's pretty amazing.
So...is it too late to change my mind about prom? Erwin clears his throat.
For you, madame, I just may grant an extension... (beat) That voice was kinda weird, sorry.
(laughs) I can't wait. Nadine clicks the phone off just as she pulls up outside KRISTA'S HOUSE, behind a parked MERCEDES. A person sittin the driver's seat waves to her. She waves back.
Show time. Nadine swallows, nervous.

Krista is folding laundry on her bed when she hears somet strange outside... It almost sounds like Radiohead's Karma Police, except something about it is not quite right. She moves to the open window, looks down to see she's bei serenaded by -- A PERSIAN MAN (45) -- big mustache, long pony tail, iridescent shirt unbuttoned to reveal copious chest hair gold jewelry. (CONTINUED )

He's standing below her window with a guitar, singing Kar Police in a very thick accent, about 10x more up-tempo, a with lots of little middle-eastern vocal trills. He tosses his hair and dances in place, feeling the rhyth During this performance, Nadine pushes a little machine o Krista's front lawn. It's a FOOTBALL FIELD PAINTER.
